description:
It’s Kazuma and Kawachi’s first day of work at Pantasia’s South Tokyo, but before they can be recognized as true bread artisans, they must satisfy the manager’s request to make a bread that even a horse will eat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brrr !! Faites un pain chevalement bon !
ฮี้ๆๆ ทำขนมปังม้ากินกันเถอะ!
ヒヒーン!! 馬味いパンを作れ!
